column2: CREATE TABLE LogSource( ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H  has a record for describing each node that generates a web log or sql log (i.e. each server that is doing the logging) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T Each record is a log node: data describe the location, the service, the instance, and other properties ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 	logID		smallint    NOT NULL default (#) ,   --/D uniqueID of this log  	location	varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D place: FNAL (FermiLab) or JHU (Johns Hopkins)  	service		varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D SkyServer, SQL, SkyService, traffic 	instance	varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D name of node 	uri		    varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&), --/D path to node: www.skyserver.org, skyserver.sdss.org, skyserver.fnal.gov, skyserver.pha.jhu.edu,                                                       --/D skyserver.sdss.org, skyservice.pha.jhu.edu,                                                       --/D cas.sdss.org, photo-z.net,                                                       --/D SDSSAD2.weblog,                                                       --/D skyquery.net, skyquery.org,                                                       --/D voservices.net, voservices.org, www.skyserver.org 	framework	varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D .NET, ASP, ASP+, SQL, WGET 	product		varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D Version of SDSS Data product:                                                       --/D  EDR, DR1, DR2, DR3, .. DR6, ALL (=traffic database) 	method		varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),   --/D how log is harvested: Xcopy, Wget, TSQL 	pathname	varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&), --/D internet location of log files 	tstamp		datetime    NOT NULL default (getdate()), --/D time last harvested 	isvisible	tinyint	    NOT NULL default (#),	 --/D # means hide this data from public.  	status		varchar(#) NOT NULL default (&&&),	 --/D  ACTIVE or INACTIVE      primary key (logID),      CONSTRAINT ak_LogSource UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED (location, instance, product)  	) go
